Name: Restore Plushie Village III
Description: You retrieved a photo from the sphere inside the morph painting, which reveals clues to a hidden past...
QuestDesc: You retrieved a photo from the sphere inside the morph painting, which reveals clues to a hidden past...

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, aren't those the cute little Plushies from the village? Nice composition, and the shot really makes the most of the scenery!

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You really captured them in action during their adventure. Have you ever thought about doing some part-time photography for us?

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName} didn't take this picture. Anyway, the Plushies got super moody when they saw it. Any idea why?

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah, I see. Well, just from the photo, I can tell the photographer is pretty skilled. But if you want to know more...

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Do you see anything, C-MOSS?

Dialogues.Speaker: C-MOSS
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: *Humphs unwillingly*... *Humphs in thought*... *Humphs in painful thought...*

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: C-MOSS? Are you all right?

Dialogues.Speaker: C-MOSS
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: *Humphs in realization*

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: C-MOSS makes sad noises and runs away.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What just happened?

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's the first time I've seen him like that. Let's follow him and see where he's going.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You see C-MOSS and the Plushies gather in a ring, as if old friends reuniting after a long time apart.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So that's why!

Options.PlotLineKey: It was C-MOSS who took that photo.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It appears so. I met C-MOSS near the village many years ago. He was practically fading away at that time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now come to think of it, C-MOSS must have left the village willingly to sustain it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How amazing! I never imagined Echoes could have such lasting, genuine friendships!

Options.PlotLineKey: Maybe humans are just a special kind of Echo?
Perhaps Echoes and humans are the same in nature?

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ha, {PlayerName} the philosopher... but this question is too deep for me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Right now, I'm more focused on getting the perfect shot. Come on, let's take a picture together!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Subtle but significant changes have taken root in Plushie Village.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (There's a photo this time?)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With a careful examination, you find it to be a group photo of four Plushies in Plushie Village.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Did Fulmine help them take this photo? I should ask him about this.)
